snippet: As the teams head into their game on Sunday afternoon, Boston Coach Claude Julien has been patient while Rangers Coach John Tortorella relentlessly pushes buttons.
abstract: New York Rangers are preparing to host Boston Bruins at Madison Square Garden; Bruins coach Claude Julien has been patient with his defending Stanley Cup champions, while Rangers coach John Tortorella is getting results from his team by relentlessly pushing buttons.
lead_paragraph: As the teams head into their game on Sunday afternoon, Boston Coach Claude Julien has been patient while Rangers Coach John Tortorella relentlessly pushes buttons.

headline.seo: Steady Rangers Ready for Up-and-Down Bruins
headline.main: Steady Rangers Ready for Up-and-Down Bruins
headline.print_headline: Diverging Fortunes of Rangers and Bruins Prove Impatience Pays Off
